title: Vella Manam Ulla Machan Lyrics Muthal Seethanam
stanzas:
<div>
Vella Manam Ulla Machan Lyrics Muthal Seethanam

vellai manam ulla machchan
vizhiyoram eeram enna

pakkathile naanirundhum
thukkathile nee irundhaa
karaiserum kaalam eppo

vellai manam ulla machchan
vizhiyoram eeram enna

kalla manam mullu thachchi
kanneeril moozhguthadi

pakkathile naan azhuga
thukkathile nee azhuga
karai serum kaalam ippo.

kalla manam mullu thachchi
kanneeril moozhguthadi

sengarumba naan marandhu
vaeli mulla yaen kadichen.
poovukkullum naagam undu
saamikkumthaan veedu rendu.

kallaiyum paalaa nee nenacha
mullaiyum poovaa nee mudicha.
ponathellaam pogattumga
yaarum ingae raman illa.

vellai manam ulla machchan
vilaiyaadi oanji vandhaan.

pakkathile nee irundhaa
sorgathile naan midhappaen.
enaalum serndhiruppen

vellai manam ulla machchan
vilaiyaadi oanji vandhaan.

koodu vittu pona kili
koadi kitta serndhathammaa
jodi vandhu serndha kili
kodi sugam kaanuthammaa

siripiya pola naan irundhu
sindhiya thaena serthuvachchen
engulathil paiya vanthaa
innum konjam kollaiyadi.

vellai manam ulla machchan
vilaiyaadi oanji vandhaan.

pakkathile nee irundhaa
sorgathile naan midhappaen.
enaalum serndhiruppen

vellai manam ulla machchan
vilaiyaadi oanji vandhaan.
